name: fluid
description: Rapid Application Development for a more... civilized age.

scripts.start:
coffee --watch --compile prototype/fluid.coffee editor/editor.coffee tests/*.coffee & 
jade --pretty --watch prototype/index.jade editor/index.jade & 
coffee tools/compile-snippets.coffee && coffee server.coffee & 
browser-sync start --proxy localhost:8080 --startPath "/prototype/" --files "prototype/*.js,prototype/*.css,prototype/*.html"
scripts.test: npm run compile-coffee && node tests/tests.js | faucet
scripts.coverage: npm run compile-coffee && istanbul cover tests/tests.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile-coffee && istanbul cover tests/tests.js --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Prithvi Prabhu <prithvi@h2o.ai> (http://h2o.ai/)
